Don't buy this game. All the chapters are unlocked no matter what, there's a scientist floating on a chair, the crowbar always sounds like you're hitting on metal, the scientist at "We've Got Hostiles!" doesn't get killed by the HECU marine, the Berreta and the M4A1 seen in the HD models don't have a reload sound, the vortigaunt in Unforseen Consequences can go through a barrel, the visuals look the same as the original, I can go on. However, there are still pros, but even with them it's still a bad game.

Primero que todo, recomiendo totalmente el Half-Life original, el juego trae bastantes errores en comparación al original, y aunque es cierto que existen algunos mods que los solucionan, sigue sin ser excusa para cobrar por lo mismo que el original, aparte que al original puedes instalarle muchos mas mods, aparte de que esta versión solo añade ragdolls, una nueva linterna, agua transparente y otras cosas que de buenas no tienen mucho, así que la verdad recomiendo mucho más el original que este "remaster" si es que se le puede llamar asi.

Та же игра что оригинал, но с одним отличием.
Движок: оригинал имеет GldSource, данный продукт мой любимый и ненавистный source.
Сюжет: остался тем же без изменения
Геймплей: изменения есть но незначительные и не заметите если вы давно проходили оригинал, либо сыграете ее в первый раз, кратко изменения есть в стрельбе и т.п.
Физика: осталось такой же топорной, как и в оригинале, но есть рэгдолл из движка source в остальном физика такая же топорная.
Минусы: они были введены самим валв, после введения Стимпайпа (вроде так называется). Конечно многие игры от валв получили хотфикс. Но сурс обделили такой возможностью. Есть фикс один он от сообщества (Гугл в помощь).
Рекомендую ли я играть?
Да (с последующей установки фикса от сообщества).

no

Pros:
1. Nice clear visuals
2. Water looks extremely amazing
3. Great Vistas
4. You can skip the "We've Got Hostiles" chapter by hitting the scientist with the crowbar
5. Weapons are so satisfying to use in this game
6. It has 3D skyboxes which look great (Not all of them)
7. The Title screen looks so cool when you open up the game
8. Flashlight looks better
9. Realistic shadows when you see NPCs

Cons:
1. Weapons look super shiny which are annoying
2. You cannot kill helicopters with the Tau Cannon or the RPG properly
3. When you first get the RPG and then try to kill the helicopter, it doesn't work!!! The RPG is extremely messed up in this game. (As well as the Tau cannon)
4. The Marines kill you so quickly because SMGs now do way more damage for some reason.
5. It is impossible to get through these encounters without significant damage.
6. IT IS LITERALLY THE ORIGINAL GAME PORTED ON THE SOURCE ENGINE!!!!!!!
7. It is completely useless because a better remake of Half-Life 1 came out called "Black Mesa" (which I have played before)
8. Skyboxes start to spaz out when you are in the chapter "Surface Tension"
9. Those big tentacles in the chapter "Blast Pit" can't even hurt you, making you put no effort at all in the chapter.
10. The "Gonarch's Lair" chapter is completely broken. The Gonarch does not attack you at all and just sits there like a lazy bastard. The Gonarch is also immune to rocket damage but is not immune to the Gluon gun that you have. It will just mostly fire that poison acid out of her ass. And to make matters worse, shooting acid will leave an ugly, stupid black square on the floor as a decal. FUCK THIS CHAPTER!!!!

I love this game even though it has so many glitches and problems. I recommend it over the worst game ever : "Hunt Down The Freeman" because it is extremely superior compared to "Hunt Down The Freeman".

Half-Life Source é uma adaptação do jogo original de [url=http://steamcommunity.com/id/nDasleyy/recommended/70/] Half-Life[/url], trocando a [i]Engine[/i] utilizada anteriormente pela utilizada no [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/nDasley/recommended/220/] Half-Life 2[/url], dando uma atualizada por consequências nos gráficos do jogo, cenários pelo qual Gordon Freeman passa, modelos de algumas armas, personagens e até sons.
    A narrativa, diálogos, tipos de inimigos e suas aparições continuam intactos preservando a experiência original, não sendo um “Remake”, pois ele não foi refeito e sim apenas copiado e adaptado ao novo motor gráfico.
  Vale a pena ser jogado pelos fãs iniciais da saga como uma experiência um tanto quanto “nova”, e para aqueles que não conhecem ainda a saga pode ser uma boa porta de entrada, por ser um jogo mais atual que o primeiro; não dispensando testar o original também para uma experiência completa.
  A portabilidade apresenta alguns bugs de texturas eventuais, na qual elas são carregadas erradas ou não são carregadas sendo um certo incômodo, mas por não serem comuns, em geral não causam tantos problemas. 
  
  [b]SEM NOTA[/b]

Unless you want Half-Life assets in Garry's Mod, rag doll physics, and better widescreen your better off with the original considering all the glitches and bugs. Also this made HLVRAI possible and inspired Black Mesa, so at least HL:S will go down in history for some good reasons.

This is not the recommended version, I only bought this so that I can play with a controller, and get the maps for gmod. If you want Half Life, get the original version on steam; it's the same price, and the DLC's work on it, ( Blue Shift, Opposing Force).

I know this almost goes without saying, but any gamer alive should play the Half-Life games. Even compared with the modern flashy big-budget single-player shooter extravaganzas of today (I'm looking at you, Far Cry and Bioshock), which are rightly heralded as amazing games, Half-Life makes your jaw drop at how amazing of an experience it is to fight throuth the crumbling Black Mesa facility battling humans and headcrabs alike. This game really makes you realize how much Jason Brody, Booker Dewitt, and every other major fps protagonist since owe the man with the crowbar, Gordon Freeman. If you are a sane human being who can play a video game, there is no excuse for you to not play Half-Life. None!

For my experiences with this version, I would say I would not recommend this game since it is buggier than the original version as well as it doesn't have the original gun models which I find weird. The game itself is a pretty good puzzle/shooter with a few hiccups in the game's flow but overall it is a fine game. 

This specific version of the game has graphical glitches that are pretty annoying when you get them and the game itself is not much of an upgrade from the original. There are some upgrades to this game that the original half life doesn't have but not by much, since all of the textures are pretty much the same and the game still looks highly outdated. Either play the original or Black Mesa since that game sounds good.
